scripts.clean:full: npm run clean:all && npm run clean:node && npm cache clean --force
scripts.build:fresh: npm run clean:all && npm run build
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run clean:cache && npm run dev
scripts.size:check: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function getSize(p){let s=0;try{const st=fs.statSync(p);if(st.isFile())return st.size;if(st.isDirectory()){fs.readdirSync(p).forEach(f=>{s+=getSize(path.join(p,f))});}}catch{}return s;}const size=getSize('.next');console.log('Total size:',(size/1024/1024).toFixed(2),'MB');"
scripts.size:analyze: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function getSize(p){let s=0;try{const st=fs.statSync(p);if(st.isFile())return st.size;if(st.isDirectory()){fs.readdirSync(p).forEach(f=>{s+=getSize(path.join(p,f))});}}catch{}return s;}const dirs=fs.readdirSync('.next').filter(f=>fs.statSync(path.join('.next',f)).isDirectory()).map(d=>({name:d,size:getSize(path.join('.next',d))})).sort((a,b)=>b.size-a.size);dirs.forEach(d=>console.log(d.name+':',(d.size/1024/1024).toFixed(2),'MB'));"
